text: innum evarkal tivinaikalait (totarntu) ceytu konteyiruntu, mutivil avarkalai maranam nerunkiya potu, "niccayamaka ippolutu nan (pavankalukkaka varunti) mannipput tetukiren" enru kurukinrarkalo, avarkalukkum, evar kahpirkalakave marikkirarkalo avarkalukkum pavamannippu illai, ittakaiyorukkut tunpam kotukkum vetanaiyaiye nam cittappatutti vaittullom
